summary: Hi! I\'m El Tucu and this is a retexture of Masser and Secunda (the two moons of Nirn!)
descriptionHtml:
[font=Impact][size=6][center]Wicked Moons Retex[/center][/size][/font]

[size=4][b]==	Introduction	==[/b][/size]

Hi! I\'m El Tucu and this is a retexture of Masser and Secunda (the two moons of Nirn!)

[size=4][b]==	Detailed features	==[/b][/size]

512 version: Vanilla resolution.
1k version: 1024x1024 resolution. <- I use this one.
2k version: 2048x2048 resolution.

[size=4][b]==	Notes	==[/b][/size]

To install just extract the .rar and place the Textures folder into your Skyrim/Data folder. Overwrite the existing files.

Since Masser is way bigger than Secunda, Masser\'s texture has double the size of Secunda\'s texture. So when i say \"1k version\" it means 1k texture for Masser and 512 texture for Secunda and so on.

If you want only one of the moons to be retextured, simply just copy the textures of the moon you want. ie, if you only want Secunda\'s textures, just copy the textures that begin with \"secunda\".

[size=4][b]==	Other mods I made	==[/b][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11362][i][b]Blacksmith\'s Hideout - Honeyside Upgrade[/i][/b][/url]

[size=4][b]==	Changelog	==[/b][/size]

Version 1.0 : First release.
author: El Tucu
